getCharsetByBOM

public CharsetExtractor.BOMDetection getCharsetByBOM(Bucket data)
                                              throws DataFilterException
Description copied from interface: CharsetExtractor
Inspect the first few bytes of the file for any obvious but type-specific BOM. Don't try too hard, if we don't find anything we will call getCharset() with some specific charset families to try.

Specified by:
getCharsetByBOM in interface CharsetExtractor
Parameters:
data - The data.
Returns:
The BOM-detected charset family, this is essentially a guess which will have to be fed to getCharset(). (A true BOM would give an exact match, but the caller will have already tested for true BOMs by this point; we are looking for "@charset \"" encoded with the given format)
Throws:
DataFilterException
